properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 9:22PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in
Georgia...

Euharlee Creek near Rockmart affecting Polk County


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Conasauga River near Tilton affecting Gordon...Murray and
Whitfield Counties

Oostanaula River near Resaca affecting Floyd and Gordon Counties

Oostanaula River near Rome US Hwy. 27 affecting Floyd County

Etowah River near Dawsonville  affecting Dawson and Forsyth
Counties

Etowah River near Canton affecting Cherokee County

Conasauga River near Eton affecting Murray and Whitfield Counties

Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield
County

Holly Creek near Chatsworth affecting Murray County

Oostanaula River near Calhoun affecting Gordon County

Armuchee Creek near Armuchee affecting Floyd County

Etowah River near Dawsonville affecting Dawson County

Etowah River near Barrettsville affecting Dawson and Forsyth
Counties

Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575 affecting Cherokee
County

Little River near Woodstock affecting Cherokee County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Little River near Woodstock.
* Until further notice.
* At 815 PM Thursday the stage was 13.5 feet, and nearly steady.
* Minor flooding is occurring, and minor flooding is expected to
continue.
* Flood stage is 11 feet.
* At 13 feet, minor flooding will continue in the woodlands and fields
upstream and downstream from the gage at Old Georgia Highway 5. A
public boat ramp just downstream and on the right bank from the
bridge will be under 3 feet of water. Portions of the South Cherokee
Recreation Park and the soccer fields off Druw Cameron Drive will be
under two feet of water.
